snippet: A proposal to bring together NYU Langone Medical Center and the Continuum Health Partners network would change how medical care is delivered in the city.
abstract: NYU Langone Medical Center and Continuum Health Partners agree to pursue a merger that would shake up the way medical care is delivered, especially in Manhattan, where hospitals compete to serve some of the wealthiest neighborhoods in the world; merger would create one of the largest health care systems in the city, with immense market power.
lead_paragraph: A proposal to bring together NYU Langone Medical Center and the Continuum Health Partners network would change how medical care is delivered in the city.

headline.seo: NYU Langone and Continuum Agree to Pursue Merger
headline.main: New York Hospitals Look to Combine, Forming a Giant
headline.print_headline: Hospital Blocs Look to Merge, Forming Giant

keywords.value: New York University Langone Medical Center
keywords.name: organizations
